de.saschafeldmann.adesso.master.thesis.portlet.view.course.contents

Interface CourseContentsView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, com.vaadin.navigator.View, ViewWithMenu
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CourseContentsViewImpl

    public interface CourseContentsView
extends ViewWithMenu
    Project: Masterthesis of Sascha Feldmann Creation date: 24.05.2016 Author: Sascha Feldmann (sascha.feldmann@gmx.de)

    University: Hochschule f√ºr Technik und Wirtschaft, Berlin Fachbereich 4 Studiengang Internationale Medieninformatik (Master)

    Company: adesso AG

    The course contents view. The user can upload course documents and enter raw texts here. It will attach LearningContent instances to the Course model in the session.
